      • deserializeLocation

        public static org.bukkit.Location deserializeLocation(java.lang.String input,
                                                      java.lang.String regex)
        This will deserialize the location. It will split the string into sections with the given regex. (Write this regex for the joinChar you've specified)
        Parameters:
        input - the string to deserialize
        regex - the regex
        Returns:
        the deserialized Location
